name: Lumio
description:
This is a game about light.
The player rotates certain lanterns, allowing light to be cast on crystals. Once all the purple crystals in a level are illuminated, the player has solved the level.

I made this game because I've always felt inspired by lanterns and the way light acts under certain conditions. I tried creating a serene atmosphere in which you can enjoy my simple game.

Sincerely,
Varya
